app_descript:
App Name: Desert Defense TD

Brief:

Embark on an epic journey to safeguard your territory in Desert Defense TD, a tower defense game that challenges your strategic prowess and combat skills. With evil foes threatening the sanctity of your home, it's your mission to unite your team, fortify your defenses, and secure your land's freedom and peace. Prepare to test your limits as you ascend through the levels, commanding your troops with tactical acumen to vanquish the malevolent invaders.
